Men's Shirt Size Chart: Neck, Chest, and Sleeve Measurements

Find your perfect shirt fit with our detailed size chart. This guide includes neck, chest, and sleeve measurements to help you choose the right shirt size, whether you're shopping for dress shirts or casual button-downs.

Neck (inches) Chest (inches) Sleeve (inches)
14 34-36 32-33
14.5 36-38 32-33
15 38-40 32-33
15.5 40-42 32-33
16 42-44 32-34
16.5 44-46 32-34
17 46-48 34-36
17.5 48-50 34-36

How to Measure for a Shirt

  1. Neck: Measure around the base of your neck where a collar would sit.
  2. Chest: Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the tape horizontal.
  3. Sleeve: Measure from the center back of your neck, over your shoulder, and down to your wrist.

Tip: When in doubt, choose a slightly larger size for comfort, especially if you're between sizes.
